availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James V. McKasson (Spencer County, Indiana, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Spencer County, Indiana, farmer and soldier. Ohio native. Son of Frederick McKasson and Margaret McKasson. Attended Indiana Asbury University in Greencastle, Indiana. Married to Mary E. Bell in Spencer County on July 26, 1856. Married to Maggie R. Heuring in Spencer County on September 12, 1864. Farmer in Spencer County in 1850. Resident of Spencer County in 1860. Served as a private in the 1st Indiana Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from July 4, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Spencer County, Jackson Township, p. 13A.

Catalogue of the Officers and Students of the Indiana Asbury University for the Year 1852-53 (Indianapolis: Indiana State Journal Steam Press, 1853), 15.
